history.content: Sounds like, because you have not completed the specific/exact courses they're looking for, you will have to petition once the appeal process is finalized.

children.subject: Which I think means you have to go through the appeal process, which has not yet been designed.
No, but I have CS61A and Stat133 completed.
I just wrote a post about this @6750. Wondering how to get around this issue too.

Sounds like, because you have not completed the specific/exact courses they're looking for, you will have to petition once the appeal process is finalized.

I think they're still figuring it out because so much is in flux/new (the data program, the new CalCentral pre-req blocking feature, interest in this class, etc).

Getting into CS C100 without Data 8

Hello,

I'm a rising senior CS major and want to take CS C100/Data C100/ Stats C100 to count as a major upper div class next semester but recently saw this FAQ page (see photo).

I was told by my advisor (an EECS/CS advisor, not a Data Science advisor) that 61A + 70 would cover for the Data 8 pre-req, however, it sounds like the system won't let me add the class and they don't have an appeals process set up yet. Is anyone dealing with a similar issue or know a way around it?

Alternatively, what would my chances be of getting in if I waited until Phase 2 in hopes that an appeals process is set up by then? I'm not sure if the enrollment histories on berkeleytime are reliable as it's such a new class.

I suppose I could take Data 8 in the fall and wait until the spring to take 100, but given my past coursework that seems kind of ridiculous to still have to take Data 8.

Thanks

history.content:
Hi, I tried to enroll Stat C100 but ended up on the waitlist. It says "703  Seats Reserved for COMPSCI C8 or INFO C8 or STAT C8 or ENGIN 7; COMPSCI 61A or COMPSCI 88; MATH 54 or ELENG 16A, or co-enrollment in MATH 54 or ELENG 16A". Does anyone know what does this reserved seats mean? I have already taken CS61A, Math 54, EE20 (previous version of EE16A). 

Resolved.

I haven't taken Data 8, which is a prereq of Data 100. Though I have taken CS61A and Stat 133 to count for Data 8, I need to fill in the appeal form.
